application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Work to be carried out - REAR Garden - Sycamore - To be removed to ground level To grind out stumpRemove debris - ALL ARISINGS / TIMBER TO GO THROUGH HOUSE.This is a large tree causing nuisance to me and all neighbours.  I have recently purchased the propoerty and I am refurbishing it.  All the neightbours approached me with a plea to remove this tree that causes large amount of debris, blocks out light and has caused root damage to back patios of the neighbours, etc.I do not plan to replace the tree with something smaller.  I will be laying grass in its place.A Tree surgeon has been consulted.  These are their detailsPremier Tree Care & Conservation LtdManor Farm, Ashford Road, Laleham VillageStaines upon Thames, Surrey, TW18 1RXUnited KingdomTelephone: 01784 463473Email premier.treecare@yahoo.co.uk
